articles.author: Jen Rose Smith, CNN
articles.title: Pandemic demand for mental health care is overwhelming providers - CNN
articles.description: At a time when the ongoing pandemic is straining mental health, many people are going without care altogether. Experts say the pandemic is worsening a shortage of mental health care providers that far predates the current crisis.
